txt.en: 'While the cooks who make hard tack ply their trade, I oversee the creation of the foods that help to speed the process of carrying and collecting all the materials we need to craft the hard tack.\n\n'The larder contains spice used to flavour snacks and hearty dishes. Collect those spices and deliver them here to ease the process of making dishes to aid participants.'
Deliver the jar of spice to the spice rack
You collected the jar of spice from the larder. Now place the jar of spice on the spice rack near where the cooks making snacks, drinks, and meals are cooking.
Everything needs a little special dwarf-spice when you are making hard tack. Cooks need this for their supporting dishes.
Hard Tack Event: The Nice Spice
Deliver the jar of spice to the spice rack
Collect a jar of spice from the larder

Cooks making dishes that help to speed movement, grant strength, and hasten actions while the dwarves make hard tack require spice from the larder. Collect the spice from the larder and deliver it to a spice rack in the main room.
Hard Tack at Thorin's Hall has ended
